mapper.select: SELECT info.`uuid` AS filmId, info.`film_name` AS filmName, detail.`film_en_name` AS filmEnName, info.`img_address` AS imgAddress, detail.`film_score` AS score, detail.`film_score_num` AS scoreNum, info.`film_box_office` AS totalBox, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(show_name SEPARATOR ',') FROM film_cat_dict_t cat WHERE FIND_IN_SET (cat.`UUID`,( SELECT REPLACE(TRIM(BOTH '#' FROM film.film_cats),'#',',') FROM film_info_t film WHERE film.`UUID` = info.uuid ))) AS info01, CONCAT((SELECT show_name FROM film_source_dict_t source WHERE source.uuid = info.`film_source`),' / ',detail.`film_length`,' 分钟') AS info02, CONCAT(info.`film_time`,' 大陆上映') AS info03 FROM film_info_t info LEFT JOIN film_detail_t detail ON info.`UUID` = detail.`film_id` WHERE info.`UUID` = #{filmId};

SELECT info.`uuid` AS filmId, info.`film_name` AS filmName, detail.`film_en_name` AS filmEnName, info.`img_address` AS imgAddress, detail.`film_score` AS score, detail.`film_score_num` AS scoreNum, info.`film_box_office` AS totalBox, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(show_name SEPARATOR ',') FROM film_cat_dict_t cat WHERE FIND_IN_SET (cat.`UUID`,( SELECT REPLACE(TRIM(BOTH '#' FROM film.film_cats),'#',',') FROM film_info_t film WHERE film.`UUID` = info.uuid ))) AS info01, CONCAT((SELECT show_name FROM film_source_dict_t source WHERE source.uuid = info.`film_source`),' / ',detail.`film_length`,' 分钟') AS info02, CONCAT(info.`film_time`,' 大陆上映') AS info03 FROM film_info_t info LEFT JOIN film_detail_t detail ON info.`UUID` = detail.`film_id` WHERE info.film_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{filmName},'%');
